episode.title: Norfolk Redevelopment and Housing Authority v. Chesapeake and Potomac Telephone Company of Virginia

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: The judgment and opinion of the Court in Norfolk Redevelopment & Housing Authority against the C & P Telephone Company will be announced by Justice Rehnquist.
